text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with a very special announcement
that's right this thursday june 8th at 2
p.m. Pacific Standard Time I'm going to
be doing a facebook live and you do not
want to miss this because in addition to
showing my face I'm going to answer
questions tell stories and anecdotes
several of which may be true as well as
discussing anything and everything
related to the food world I'm talking
crazy trends desert island foods my
favorite kitchen tools and I might even
throw in a couple magic tricks and
you're probably saying to yourself that
all sounds great but how the heck do we
find it well simply go to all recipes
Facebook page Thursday at 2 p.m. and I
will be there live so I really do hope
you check that out and as always enjoy
